thread.title: Early Man, A Stop-Motion Animated Prehistoric Caveman Film by the Creators of Wallace & Gromit
thread.title_full: Early Man, A Stop-Motion Animated Prehistoric Caveman Film by the Creators of Wallace & Gromit

author: Justin Page
title: Early Man, A Stop-Motion Animated Prehistoric Caveman Film by the Creators of Wallace & Gromit

organizations.name: creators of wallace & gromit  aardman animations

text:
Aardman Animations has released a teaser trailer for Early Man , an upcoming stop-motion animated prehistoric caveman film directed by Wallace and Gromit and Chicken Run creator Nick Park . The movie follows Dug ( Eddie Redmayne ), a caveman who leads his tribe to go up against the villainous Lord Nooth ( Tom Hiddleston ). Early Man is set to be released in January 2018.
Set at the dawn of time, when prehistoric creatures roamed the earth, EARLY MAN tells the story of courageous caveman hero Dug (Eddie Redmayne) and his best friend Hognob as they unite his tribe against a mighty enemy Lord Nooth (Tom Hiddleston) and his Bronze Age City to save their home. 
Currently in production in Bristol, Hiddleston and Maisie Williams (Goona) will be joined by additional voice cast playing characters from the Bronze Age city to be announced in the coming weeks.


A post shared by Early Man (@earlymanmovie) on Oct 4, 2016 at 3:51am PDT 

A post shared by Early Man (@earlymanmovie) on Jan 17, 2017 at 5:14am PST
